template <typename Block>
class vsip::impl::Subset_block
File: ../../../vsip/core/subblock.hpp

The Subset_block class maps all accesses through a Domain instance before forwarding to the underlying block. Thus, for instance, if a 1-dimensional vector of length N is the underlying block, and the Domain instance in use is Domain<1>(N/2)*2, then the Subset_block class will expose every other element of the underlying block.
